item.title: Tourist ‘Is in Trouble’ After Stones Taken From Pompeii, Police Say
item.description: A Scottish man is under investigation for aggravated theft, police officials said, after visiting the ancient Italian site.

item.title: How China Went From Clean Energy Copycat to Global Innovator
item.description: A surge in high quality research and patent applications has cemented China’s dominance in the industry.
